summary: Christmas, family, and infidelity. Yvette's husband has died, and her grown daughters join her at the grave: Sonia, wealthy, bourgeois, and generous; Louba, living with their dad Stanislas,... See full summary »
cast: Sabine Azéma|Emmanuelle Béart|Charlotte Gainsbourg|Claude Rich|Françoise Fabian|Christopher Thompson|Jean-Pierre Darroussin|Isabelle Carré|Samuel Labarthe|Françoise Brion|Hélène Fillières|Thierry Hancisse|Marie de Villepin|Didier Becchetti|Jean-Pierre Marino|Neil Ingle|Liliana Delahaye|Matteo D'Amico|Nicolas de Angelis|Bertrand Cervera|Pierre Chollet|Jorg Schnass|Andrea Schieffer|Katherine Erhardy|Lola Zajdermann|Lily Galland|Bernard Lannes|Céline Caussimon|Eloïse Labro|Antoine Blanquefort|Julie Leibowitch
title: La bûche (Cena de Navidad)
